DOC.brief_summary: It is a double blinded randomized control trial assessing the use of Oral paracetamol in managing the intrapartum pain.
DOC.brief_title: Oral Paracetamol as Preemptive Analgesia for Labor Pain
DOC.detailed_description: It is a double blinded randomized control trial comparing the use of Oral paracetamol to placebo in managing the intrapartum pain.
DOC.criteria: primigravida The gestational age between 37 42 weeks Not seeking analgesia Singleton pregnancy vertex Spontaneous onset of labour 1st stage of labour (less than 5 cm) Extreme of age (below18above 40) Multiparous Multiple gestation Malpresentation Congenital or acquired pelvic abnormalities(eg. Poliomyelitis) Any medical disorder with pregnancy Induction of labour Advanced 1st stage > 5 cm Use of any other kind of analgesia before recruitment in the study Scared uterus Fetal distress
